mapper.select: select S.*, M.member_nickname from sns S left outer join member M on S.member_no = M.member_no where S.sns_no = #{snsNo}
mapper.update: update sns set sns_detail = #{snsDetail} where sns_no = #{snsNo}

update sns set sns_count = sns_count +1 where sns_no = #{snsNo}
and member_no != ${memberNo}
